name: Tiny Racing
description: A nostalgic top-down racing game with vibrant pixel art. Choose from unique vehicles, conquer constrasting tracks, and master different modes. With intuitive arcade controls, experience high-speed excitement and become the ultimate racing champion in this retro adventure!

name: Demon Inc.
description:
Demon Inc. is a strategic deck-building game where players take on the role of a demon CEO, trying to dominate the business world by taking down their competitors. Assemble powerful card combinations, expand your influence across diverse biomes, and make calculated decisions to grow your empire.

Featuring a dynamic mix of resource management, tactical card play, and evolving abilities, Demon Inc. challenges players to harness the power of demonic contracts and outmaneuver rival entities.

name: Golf Gambit
description: Mini-golf with traps, tricks, and tornados! Deploy your traps to mess with your opponents or find a new path to a hole-in-one! Golf Gambit is a fun and frantic mini-golf party game for up to 8 players.

name: Beyond the Map
description: Survival ARPG set in a procedurally-generated fantasy world. Build your base, craft powerful armor, and embark on a journey to uncover ancient secrets of this mysterious realm.

name: Fear FA 98
description: FEAR FA 98: Silent Hill mixed with FIFA 98. Use your enemies' heads as the ball, use knives, and summon demons! the very first survival horror soccer simulator!. Play against the computer, or the classic local mode to enjoy with your friends on a terrifying afternoon worthy of the '90s.

name: The Electrifying Incident: A Monster Mini-Expedition
description: An adorable bite-sized adventure from the creators of A Monster’s Expedition - explore the facility, avoid the live electricity, and repair the malfunctioning reactor.

name: Green Thing from the Planet Jupiter
DDinosaur with Double D's
description: DDinosaur has felt alone for millions of years now... Will she be able to find love without revealing her biggest secret? That she's a Dinosaur...with double D's.

name: Blackshard
description: Blackshard is a first-person exploration game. Wander through a strange megastructure, the Labyrinth, to unravel its mysteries... Your behavior within the Labyrinth will define the outcome of your journey. What path will you choose to take?

name: Store Empire
description: Build your own retail empire on a paradise island. Buy, manage, and expand your stores, attract customers with advertising, and adapt to unexpected events. Protect your business from thieves and dominate the market.

name: NecroWorld
description: NecroWorld is a RPG that takes place in the NecroCatic Games world with many unique characters, enemies, upgrades and collectibles!

name: Silent Burial
description: A downloadable atmospheric horror game for Windows. Experience a chilling environment where every shadow hides a secret, and every sound keeps you on edge.

name: Blueprint Bob
description: Stack, twist, and balance your way to record-breaking heights. Create the tallest, most daring structures imaginable, and help Bob reach for the sky!

name: Last Drop
description: Last Drop is a story you need to experience. Welcome to Nykylä Finland 1994. Seppo Sahtivaara and friends are waiting for you. This is an openworld action game with a story that has an impact. We bring back old good games and action from the best movies from that era. We want you to enjoy!

name: Gambler Densetsu Tetsuya Digest
description: Gambler Densetsu Tetsuya Digest is a mahjong game from Athena. This new installment in the popular Japanese Mahjong series "Gambler Densetsu" features four different scenarios. Players have conversations with the roster of 26 characters while trying to beat them with an inventory system of cheating techniques. In addition to its large cast, the game includes three gameplay modes, a scenario battle mode, a free battle mode, and a survival battle mode. The game's official title is Shoubushi Densetsu: Tetsuya DIGEST, but with the furigana subtitle "Gambler" for Shoubushi.

name: Frontline Fury: Trenches, Mud & Blood
description: Enter the brutal battlefields of World War II in this grim, blood-soaked top-down shooter. Fight your way through relentless enemies with brutal gunplay, gritty visuals, and intense, unforgiving combat. Every bullet counts as you move through the trenches, leaving a trail of destruction and gore.

name: Fire Hero: Pixel Rescue
description: Fire Hero - Pixel Rescue is a 2D pixel art platformer where you play as a firefighter rescuing civilians and animals from burning buildings. You'll travel through different worlds and biomes, following a story with short dialogues that reveal the dramatic events your character is experiencing.

name: Escape the Quack
description: Get ready to race in this exciting platformer against the clock, complete your tasks, and outsmart the duck in this captivating low-poly world! Compete against friends and the world with an online leaderboard.

name: Intermundia: Dungeons, Polygons & Magic
description: Intermundia: Dungeons, Polygons & Magic is an RPG with a deep turn-based combat system and a story filled with multiple choices and endings. Let yourself be carried away by this epic adventure: plan your moves, choose your destiny and be prepared to face the consequences!

name: Leafing Home
description: Leafing Home is a cozy adventure game where you play as a small squirrel on a quest to retrieve the World Tree’s stolen fruit and find your way back home. Explore a vibrant world filled with quirky characters, and help restore nature to its former glory. Master unique flight mechanics, tackle aerial challenges, solve puzzles, and dive into a variety of fun mini-games. This heartwarming tale of belonging and environmentalism is perfect for players of all ages.

name: Dream Life in the Country Side
Operation Zero
description: Grab your biggest gun and jump into this story-driven top-down run-and-gun sci-fi arcade shooter starring the ultimate bio-engineered hero-manchild TASKILLER!

name: It Was You
description: A multiplayer murder mystery party for up to 12 players. Assume the role of Detective or Killer and use tools to uncover—or manipulate—evidence. Murder, investigate, discuss and deceive. Put your true-crime-solving skills to the test, or see if you are capable of cold-blooded murder.

name: Sayonara Wild Hearts
description:
Sayonara Wild Hearts is a dreamy arcade game about riding motorcycles, skateboarding, dance battling, shooting lasers, wielding swords, and breaking hearts at 200 mph. Now available on PlayStation 5 with a brand-new exclusive unlockable game mode, the Remix Arcade.

In the new PlayStation 5-exclusive Remix Arcade mode, speed through infinitely replayable levels and chase high scores in random sound bites, all with no loading. Sayonara Wild Hearts now features stunning 4K resolution, 120 FPS, and haptic feedback through the DualSense controller, delivering pulse-pounding, immersive action.

name: Dreamwalker
description:
Dreamwalker is a top-down story RPG game with deckbuilding combat.

Embark on a journey through dreams and nightmares in Dreamwalker, a 2D top-down RPG set in a mesmerizing pixel art world. You are a wandering traveler, drawn to a small village shrouded in mystery and cursed by an ancient evil.

name: Startron
description: Startron is an ASCII-based space colony sim where you can mine, harvest, build and automate your way across a procedurally generated cosmos. Lead a crew of sentient cats (or dogs) as they take their first steps out and discover the mysteries of the cosmos.

name: Cave Path
description: Mine for valuable ores in a dangerous cave. Gather resources, fight monsters, and invest your earnings in skill upgrades as you push deeper for bigger rewards

name: Pacific Drive: Frosted Customization Pack
description: Decorations, a little hot cocoa, and cozy friends are all you need to hibernate for the season. Prepare for the cold and decorate your station wagon with winter themed cosmetics!

name: Flesh Psychosis
description: Flesh Psychosis is a little casual puzzle game, in which you have to score as much as possible. You have to collect various spooky ingredients and make deathly meals, using gravity and mad scientist tools.

name: The Lonesome Guild
description: In a world consumed by loneliness, only friendship can save the day. Lead a quirky cast in this colorful single-player ARPG full of heart, battles, and bonds that change everything.

name: Balatro: Friends of Jimbo 4
description: Customise your decks with stunning new cosmetic card skins featuring fan-favourite characters like Vault Boy, Ezio Auditore da Firenze, Percival Fredrickstein von Musel Klossowski de Rolo III and more!

name: RockBeasts
description: Lead a band of misfits on a roller-coaster ride to stardom in the age of MTV, rock anthems, and bad haircuts. ROCKBEASTS is a story-driven, role-playing management game that puts you in the shoes of a manager of an up-and-coming rock band. Your job – take them to the top.

name: Spamware
description: You are sentenced to 3000 hours in prison. Earn your freedom by identifying and reporting spam.

name: A Hole in my Room
description: Explore a mysterious place and an atmospheric world filled with horrifying and unusual environments in this first-person psychological horror game. Find hidden objects, solve puzzles, hide from darkness, and enjoy a unique experience in the horror genre.

name: Bubble Battle Blast 3D
description: Bubble Battle Blast 3D is a retro arcade third-person shooter in which a spaceship battles its way through 8 arenas in which a guard drone protects bubbles. Earn ship-enhancing items and temporary power-ups by blasting bubbles with lasers, Earn bonus points after each arena to upgrade faster.

name: Dream Heights
description: "Dream Heights" is a mobile game developed by Zynga where players build their own skyscraper by adding different floors with stores, restaurants, apartments, and more, where the goal is to create a thriving tower by managing your residents and businesses within it; it allows players to customise their tower, connect with friends, and even outbuild famous landmarks like the Statue of Liberty.

name: Wild Willy West
description: Wild Willy West is a western top-down shoot 'em up, featuring action packed levels and instant death combat. Use an arsenal of magical bullets to blast your way through the old west, and take revenge on those who wronged you.

name: Ladies I'm Ready
description: The player becomes Samuel, uses the first-person perspective to immerse himself in meeting two beauties, and embarks on a joyful and sweet love journey with them. Two girls with different personalities, and it is up to you to decide who will go to the end with you.

name: 3D Escape Room: Detective Story
description: 3D Escape Room: Detective Story is an immersive 3D puzzle game that takes you to 1930s London. In the game, you play as an insightful private detective, searching for clues in realistic 3D environments, solving intricate puzzles and mini-games, and cracking bizarre cases.

name: The Suspense
description: How might life inside Artificial Intelligence be like? Is it possible to stop this painful routine? This life even real or not? Try your luck...

name: Sovereign Brain Empire
description: “Who isn’t a baby anyway?”~You travelled to a parallel world governed by the Sovereign Brain AI. In SB Empire, you’re an adopted “one-year-old”, recognized as a "Monarch-level" prodigy! There will be beauties giving you a sheltered babyhood. Your brilliance and privileges will change their fates!

name: Haydee 3
description: Haydee III is a hardcore metroidvania with third-person shooter mechanics, platforming, puzzles, a sexy heroine and cake!

name: Tincan
description: This is not for the light of heart. Navigate Tincan through a nearly impossible platforming adventure. Can you win?

name: The Wind's Path
description: The Wind's Path is a fast-paced top down singleplayer game. If you want to stay alive, keep moving. A mysterious force is wreaking havoc in other worlds and only you can stop it. You'll unlock powerful wind abilities that not only make you a force of nature but help you fly through difficult levels.

name: Tincan HD
description: Released March 6th, 2013, to celebrate five full years of game development, Tincan HD is a remake of the original game in C++ using the Allegro library, as well as a custom engine I built myself for the language.

name: Idle Craft
description: Start from the most basic elements and help your World evolve through the timeline of progress. Merge elements, unlock new discoveries, and enjoy a satisfying blend of idle and strategic gameplay! And you know what? Your World continues to evolve even while you're away!

name: The Brothers Hotel
description: Welcome to The Brothers Hotel, where shadows whisper secrets, and every corner hides untold horrors. This spine-chilling indie horror game takes you deep into a mysterious hotel filled with eerie atmospheres, enigmatic puzzles, and a story that unveils the dark bond of two brothers.

name: Train Metropolis
description: Idle Clicker City Builder. Build and manage your railway company, helping the city expand and thrive as you grow together.

name: Parking Master
description: Parking Master is the ultimate parking simulation! Park with precision using real mirrors and advanced car systems. Navigate tight spots, manage your own parking empire across Europe and Japan. Build, expand, and conquer diverse environments!

name: Chip ‘n Clawz vs. The Brainioids
description: An action-strategy game where you gather Brainium, build a base, and command your army of bots to defeat the freaky Brains-in-Jars aliens. Lead from the front with your hero, Chip or Clawz, or both in co-op. Look out for ejected alien brains, you can squish ‘em!

name: Fishing the Abyss
description: This is a relaxing atmospheric game where you simply watch a robot catch creatures. Place it at the edge of your screen like a vertical desktop accessory and observe the ecosystem. It’s neither an idle game with mountains of stats nor an exciting fishing game.

name: Hang up Street
description: Build your vocational academy to turn adventurers into your idle heroes, liven up the deserted streets, and advance the levels together!

name: Sunset Town
description: Explore a post-apocalyptic city destroyed by a solar flare. Fight mutated creatures, hostile factions, and harsh environments while scavenging for resources. Manage survival needs, upgrade gear, and uncover the truth behind the disaster in this challenging, randomly generated adventure.

name: Muse
description: A narrative-driven visual novel where you help Clara, a struggling artist, overcome her creative block through painting mini-games and emotional choices in a surreal dream world.

name: Plantasia
description: Plantasia is a cozy semi-idle, gardening & puzzle game designed to sit at the bottom 1/3 of your screen so you can play in-between tasks without disrupting your work!

name: ProtoBound
description: ProtoBound is an obstacle-avoidance game in which you navigate your character through various obstacles. It's inspired by bound-type custom maps for StarCraft.

name: Omelet You Cook
description: The omelet-cooking roguelike. Assemble omelets for quirky customers using ingredients from a conveyor belt. Discover insane ingredient combinations to fulfill an ever-increasing score threshold. Overcome the hazards and restrictions of each customer and unlock new ingredients to use on future runs!

name: Full House Casino
description: The NEW free to play Full House Casino has the most unique style of jackpot world casino slots and classic casino games! enjoy 100+ well-picked jackpot world slots from Vegas and Macau Casino, compete with real-time players and win huge Golden JACKPOT! Experience top table games like Jackpot Bingo, Golden Blackjack, Texas Holdem, Mahjong and many more! Compete with your friends to become the legendary big fish golden winner in our Daily Jackpot Tournament! With 8,000,000+ downloads worldwide & 500,000 5-star-rating, Full House Casino is definitely one of the best free jackpot world casino games in the world! Let's Spin Now!

name: Warborne: Above Ashes
description: Fierce flames of war are now raging. We roam, fight, and defeat all who stand in the way of our ambitions. Join a faction in the sci-fi post apocalyptic-style multiplayer PvP war game Warborne Above Ashes, and fight for honor!

name: Smiling Misery
description: Smiling Misery is an interactive tale that introduces us to the story of Margo, a jester who, weary of a comfortable life, embarks on a journey to seek misery. Join Margo on a brief adventure through a Mediterranean medieval kingdom and bring the story to its conclusion.

name: Doki Doki: The Dark Rainclouds
description: Doki Doki: The Dark Rainclouds is a fan mod for Doki Doki Literature Club! that delves into a darker and more emotionally profound approach to the original story. In this mod, players explore Sayori's journey from a new perspective, highlighting her inner struggles, hidden thoughts and the challenges she faces in her everyday life.

name: Stratogun
description: Stratogun is an ultra-fast orbital arcade space shooter where a fraction of a second will decide whether you live or die. Do you have what it takes to survive on the orbit? Play the demo and find out.

name: Assetflip Attorney
description: Assetflip attorney is a murder mystery satire visual novel, Solve crimes in a world where everyone has gone insane and everything feels like a fever dream, interrogate witnesses, hunt for clues and take down the criminal organization that threatens to destroy reality.

name: Perfect World: Ascend
description:
Join players worldwide on the same server. Switch between landscape and portrait modes at will. The latest masterpiece from the 20-year classic IP “Perfect World” is now officially released globally!

[ Perfect World: Ascend ] offers a truly open 3D world with high freedom and diverse gameplay.
Choose from a variety of cool professions and engage in exciting cross-server battles.
The innovative rotatable screen design allows you to switch between landscape and portrait modes at will.

developers.name: Perfect World Games Singapore Pte Ltd

name: Goo Hunter
description: Play as a brave Slime treasure hunter who uses her unique abilities to overcome dangerous obstacles and solve intriguing puzzles. With her sticky hands, she skillfully launches herself, uncovering the best path to progress in her adventure.

name: Alliance Peacefighter
description: A linear, story-driven space sim in the style of 90s classics like X-Wing and Wing Commander. As a newly qualified Alliance pilot, you find yourself caught up in a plot to break the fragile peace between two galactic super powers.

name: Harold Rabbit: Finder of Lost Things
Tiny Duck Hunt 3D
description: Next generation arcade game in a cute cartoon 3D world. Sweet graphics, nice gameplay, unique control system focused on handheld and joypad gaming.

name: Creepy Redneck Dinosaur Mansion 3
description: MATCH DNA BUBBLES IN AN UNDERGROUND LAB TO KEEP YOUR PSYCHIC CLONE FROM INVADING YOUR MIND AND TURNING YOU INTO A CANNIBAL. This is the match-3 survival horror comedy RPG metroidvania you didn't know you needed.

name: Azure Flame
description:
Vance and Carmelo, 2 friends who have lived in the city of Calida—capital city of the region of Dracaena, where dragons come from—since their birth have recently started dating.

Unfortunately, Carmelo’s family doesn’t approve of Vance due to old family traditions as well as the unspoken "rules" of Dracaena. To make matters worse, Vance is discriminated against for being a hybrid and not a “pure” dragon.

Will these lovers be able to escape? Or are they doomed to be separated?

name: Escape Observation
description: ‘Escape Observation’ is a short walking simulator inspired by the game ‘The Exit 8’, where you can only move your character and control your vision. It is important to note that the game is not about finding out if a room has changed, but rather that each room is different and you must be aware of the signals that these changes give you.

name: BuildNow GG
description: BuildNow GG is part of an emerging genre of online game that combines tactical building with third-person shooter gameplay, featuring various game modes, weapons, and cosmetic items.

name: RLChess
description: Dive into the ultimate chess showdown with RLChess! It's not just a board game; it's an epic battlefield where classic chess meets wild party antics. Get ready for a chess revolution that's packed with thrilling twists and lively interaction. Charge into RLChess and turn the chess world on its head!

name: Only for Gamers
description: The game was designed for only Pro gamers. There are many hard obstacles in the game. You have to find a correct solution to overcome all the obstacles. However, It will not be as easy as you imagine.

name: Momoka
description: MOMOKA is a RPG Maker Pixel Horror Adventure game made in RPG Maker 2003. It was made for IGMC 2018.

name: Video Game Grid
description: Browser-based video game trivia with daily 3x3 puzzles to solve and share results. Powered by IGDB.

name: Cribbish
description: The roguelike deck builder for Cribbage.

name: Electigirl: High Tension Beauty
description: A retro and free-scrolling shoot 'em up. The plot follows a city being drained of electric supply by otherworldly invaders.

name: Edge of Memories
description: The Corrosion, a plague of unparalleled proportions, has already ravaged the Astryan continent. On the other side of the world, the continent of Avaris and its nomadic peoples—so far spared from the horrors spawned by this abomination—now stand on the brink of extinction. Eline, an itinerant Soul Whisperer, relentlessly battles the force that turns the once-thriving fauna, flora and humans of this lush land into grotesque abominations. Following a mysterious encounter, a dark power awakens within her, one that may hold the key to ending this apocalypse: the ability to control the Corrosion within her own body.

name: This is Kiko
description: A long time ago, my younger sister and I lived together in a house by the sea.And then, one day—I remember meeting her.Was she a good person? I should have asked myself that question sooner."THIS IS KIKO" is an adventure game set in the modern era.

name: Elmo Through the Looking-Glass
description: In this game, Elmo goes through the looking-glass in his room to find the little red monster he sees there. Skills emphasized include object identification, visual discrimination, vocabulary, matching, and reading. The game is inspired by Alice Through The Looking-Glass (Alice in Wonderland).

name: Grover's Travels
description: Grover's Travels is a 1998 CD-ROM game developed by Encore Software and Children's Television Workshop. In this parody of Gulliver's Travels, users join Grover as he meets Big Bird, Elmo, Mr. Snuffleupagus and more. There are six activities designed to teach numbers, shapes, sound recognition, story comprehension and emotions.

name: Golly Soda Pop
description: A Brazilian soda brand that existed from the 40s until the 60s, closed its doors after a macabre incident... Nowadays, an urban legend circulates that says a creature roams the abandoned bottling factory's corridors. May God help the poor soul who dares to enter this place...

name: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 – Deluxe Edition
description: Get the ultimate Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 experience with the Deluxe Edition!

name: Tincan 2
description: A difficult platformer revolving around the blue box named "Tincan". Navigate Tincan through 7 stages, each one becoming more impossible than the last. With the aid of launch pads and switches, Tincan must now also avoid moving spikes and lasers. Tincan 2 features exciting music by Zack Harmon and graphics by Noel Berry.

name: Skull Skull Skull
description: Skull Skull Skull is a top-down arena shooter roguelite where you fight off hordes of skulls. Customize your gun and choose power ups to survive as long as possible.

name: Bunny Love Expert
description:
Reisen has been having troubles with love lately... but she's far from the only one. Basically every bunny in all of Eientei is asking for her help to get with the rabbit of their dreams, leaving with little time to handle her own issues.

Solve everyone's problems (somehow) by solving 28 bunny-based puzzles, picking stuff up or using items and devices to direct the bunnies to where they want to go!

name: Cralon
description: Cralon is an authentic 3D dungeon crawler with RPG and adventure elements, inspired by the ultimate dungeon classics. Hunting a demon, you fell into the abyss of an old mine. Equip yourself, fight creatures, solve quests, uncover secrets and find a way out.

name: Loop: New Reality
description: A VR game play tester finds herself locked in a NEW REALITY! Slip on the revolutionary NEW REALITY headset and dive into the mesmerizing purple void. But beware—The Warden prowls relentlessly, hunting for its next prey.

name: A Week in the Life of Asocial Giraffe
description: “A Week in the Life of Asocial Giraffe” is a point-and-click stealth game where the goal is to make sure nobody talks to you so that your head does not explode. You'll get to experience an average week of Giraffe's life as he does exciting things on his to-do list, such as going to the laundromat, peruses antique stores, purchasing groceries, and working out at the gym, all while making sure the incredibly sociable citizens of Friendly City never have a chance to speak with him for fear of losing your head.

name: Company of Heroes 3: Fire & Steel
description:
Company of Heroes 3: Fire and Steel is a Battlegroup DLC pack consisting of four Battlegroups for Multiplayer and Co-Op/ skirmish vs AI.

US Forces – Heavy Weapons Battlegroup
Superior team weapons and halftracks control the battlefield before heavy armor arrives to finish the fight.

Requisition .50 cal heavy machine guns or off-map batteries of the devastating Black Dragon howitzer as part of Weapons Team support, or call in the Cavalry, with Assault half-track variants, 3-inch towed Anti-tank guns, and the implacable M26 Pershing heavy tank.

Wehrmacht – Terror Battlegroup
Shatter the enemy’s willpower with airstrikes, suppression and superior infantry tactics. Devastating heavy weapons will destroy anything that remains standing.

Use unorthodox Terror Tactics such as field interrogations, the Stuka’s iconic Jericho Trumpet, or V1 Rocket Strikes to force the enemy from the field, or show the enemy no quarter with Weapon Superiority and the King Tiger heavy tank.

British Forces – Canadian Shock Battlegroup
Seize territory to gain unparalleled momentum on the battlefield, and deploy powerful incendiary weapons to displace any who dare deny your movement.

Call upon Canadian Shock Sections and aggressive battlefield tactics to secure ground in a Shock Assault, or deny the enemy what they stubbornly refuse to cede with Incendiary Weapons, including the indefatigable Churchill Crocodile.

Afrikakorps – Panzerjäger Kommand Battlegroup
Cripple the enemy’s advance with defensive obstacles, enabling powerful anti-armor weapons to make the killing blow.

Use Stalling tactics, including Roadblocks, Minefields and Defensive Positions to buy the time you need to deploy your forces; elite Tank Busters and Tank Hunting tactics including the Elefant Tank Destroyer will crush even the strongest enemy armor.

name: Tilecan
description:
This game was created as a part of the "0 hour game jam", a game jam taking place over the end of Daylight Savings Time, between 2 AM and 2 AM.

Collect gems to increase your score while avoiding tiles the same color as you, but be careful - each gem will change your color!

name: Save The Village: Tower Defense
description: Save The Village is a medieval tower defense game where you strategically protect villages from waves of skeletons, goblins, and fearsome bosses. Build powerful towers and use magical abilities to fend off the invading forces!

name: Home Again
description: Home Again is an interactive story game about Jason, a man stuck in an endless loop of work who adopts a stray cat. Discover Jason's journey through the eyes of his little cat friend as they meet Melissa, a caring florist who will change the way Jason sees the life.

name: Shop Simulator: Waifu Pillows
description: Konnichiwa Shop-owner-kun! Become a hero of the weeb/otaku community in a cute Japanese suburb with your very own waifu pillow shop! Stock your shelves with exciting dakimakura designs, expand your store, and make a fortune in Shop Simulator: Waifu Pillows!

name: El Hero
description: El Hero is a 100% Brazilian Battle Royale, developed by Moonite! Bringing Brazilianness in every aspect, El Hero provides a unique gameplay, mechanics & environment experience for your Hero.

name: First! Person Shooter
description:
A game made for 7DFPS 2013.

YouTube is littered with people commenting "FIRST!", so obliterate them in the fast paced shooter "FIRST! Person Shooter." Sort through comments on a quest to cleanse YouTube, while trying not to delete useful comments.

Graphics by yours truly, music by Kevin MacLeod used under a Creative Commons License.

name: Lily & Sury: Adventures On Cristya
description:
Classic retro-style platform game. Help Lily or Sury save your friends from the evil Wuning through 8 worlds and 32 levels.

In this game you will find 32 challenging levels, find secret treasures, jump, crush your enemies and go through multiple obstacles, stairs, cliffs, spikes, various enemies and most importantly, save your companions from the hands of Wuning to prevent them from destroying the planet Cristya.

name: Chess Bomb
description: Chess Bomb is a unique puzzle game where bombs take the shape of chess pieces. Strategically use these explosive chess bombs to fend off waves of invading monsters threatening the chess kingdom.

name: Siberian Way
description: Siberian Way is a historical detective thriller. Follow the dark non-linear story and decide how it can end! For all fans of snowy Siberia, Murder on the Orient Express and twisted plots, seasoned with mysticism.

name: Museum of All Things
description: Visit the Museum of All Things, a nearly-infinite virtual museum generated from Wikipedia! You can find exhibits on millions of topics, from the Architecture of Liverpool to Zoroastrianism. Search for the topic you want to learn about, or just wander from topic to topic as your curiosity dictates!

name: Signal: Uncharted Lands
description: Embark on a journey with four adorable explorers! Uncover all the secrets of a post-apocalyptic world, meet the future inhabitants of Earth and enjoy plenty of Easter eggs. Your choices will shape the game's ending, so choose wisely! Or try a second playthrough to catch all the fun moments!

name: What's On The Menu?
description: In What's on the Menu?, step into the shoes of a restaurant manager. From selecting ingredients and crafting menus to hiring staff and customizing your restaurant, every decision counts. Face random events, unlock new recipes, and rise through the ranks to become the ultimate restaurateur!

name: Flood of Zombies
description: 《flood of zombies》 is a third-person roguelike shooting game in which the player takes on the role of a soldier, defending against numerous zombie attacks!

name: Surf Dance
description: Next to the cartoonish cute style island, with your favorite cute animals, experience the excitement of high-speed sprint in the rhythm of platform jumps.

name: Refence
description: Refence is a roguelike based idle defense game, where you can choose heroes and their traits, upgrade your castle, and manage resources to fend off enemies trying to attack your castle.

name: ZenGM Hockey
description: A free browser-based sports team management game where you are the general manager of an ice hockey team.

name: Pixelwoods: Coloring Book & Decor
description:
Pixelwoods is a coloring game from Beresnev. It features hundreds of signature Color By Number pictures, an old mansion in need of makeover and new design, cute pixel art, and a story!

Ellie's parents disappeared when she was very young. Now the aspiring artist returns home to solve the mystery of their disappearance, restore the old house, and learn about the special magic of Pixelwoods...

Talking animals, smart plants, a machine for interdimensional travels coexist here with home design talks, a love triangle and, of course, coloring by numbers!

name: Bakken: Ski Jumping 2025
description: Bakken 25 is a winter sports simulation game. Become a ski jumper and master every aspect of the discipline from the inrun to the outrun: the jumping, the flying and the landing! Are you ready for a new season?

name: Rugrats Go Wild Wildlife Rescue
description:
The Nickelodeon Wildlife Rescue games were a series of video games released by Nickelodeon throughout the early to mid 2000s. The concept of the series was that the player would act as a ranger working to rescue sick, endangered animals by bringing them to a compound and nursing them back to health by finding or buying them medicine, food, and water.

Rugrats Go Wild Wildlife Rescue was a flash game released in 2003 to promote the eponymous crossover film and took place in the South China Sea.

The was entirely lost, as they were removed from Nick.com circa 2011. Few screenshots can be found, and no gameplay footage seems to exist of either game. An archived version is also available, but due to the internet requirements, it is seemingly unplayable as is.

name: Hazmat Hijinx
description: In Hazmat Hijinks, you’ll need multicolored hazmat suits for protection as you traverse chemical spills, walk through radiation, and battle the Cleaners in your quest to rescue Hanford’s furry friend.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Tales of Agrabah
description: The 15th free update for Disney Dreamlight Valley brings the new Aladdin Realm, the new characters Aladdin and Jasmine, four new Floating Islands, improvements for cooking and UI, custom size rooms and the Oasis Retreat Star Path.

name: Dragon Attack Mythologies: A Night Wolf Revenge
Tomb Raider Collection 2
description: The legend of Lara Croft continues on Evercade! Uncover an ancient Egyptian mystery and prevent the end of the world in Tomb Raider: The Last Revelation, and relive a series of Lara’s most noteworthy adventures from her past in Tomb Raider: Chronicles. Also includes a brand-new version of a special bonus level, previously only distributed for home computers.

name: Overtime Pay
description: As the clock strikes midnight, you find yourself trapped within the oppressive confines of a desolate office. Your task seems straightforward: Keep putting the correct paper in the correct place and you might find yourself entitled to overtime pay. And will you?

name: Faun Town
description: Faun Town is a relaxing automation-building puzzle game. After crash-landing on a mysterious island and losing your memory, you must use the island's resources to build automated production lines and repair your ship.

name: Painted Legend: Knights of Ink & Paper
description: An action-adventure platformer in the metroidvania subgenre. The graphics are made in the style of a checkered notebook and blue ink. Defeat crowds of monsters, overcome traps, explore the game world, unlock new characters and find secrets! And all this to the accompaniment of driving music!

name: Wrap House Simulator
description: Welcome to Wrap House Simulator! Run your own wrap shop, chop, grill, and serve in this cooking adventure. Customize your shop, master the grill, and survive the rush solo or co-op with up to 4 players. Keep up with orders, satisfy customers, and build your dream restaurant!

name: Detective: Rainy Night
description: Detective Rainy Night is a narrative adventure with elements of deduction. Violent crimes, mature stories, and a touch of psychological horror await you at the Motel Holiday. Grab a pencil and paper because solving this case won’t be easy.

name: MeMic
description: MeMic is an atmospheric stealth game with horror elements, where you take on the role of a mimic, able to disguise yourself as everyday objects.

name: Axom: Conquest
description: A base building roguelite tower defence game set on the dangerous planet named Axom. Gather resources to build defences, unlock research between games to get stronger and ultimately unlock the secrets of the mysterious planet.

name: Theurgy Architect
description: Are you ready to wield the power of creation? In Theurgy City, you are the divine architect. With just a touch, reshape the land and watch as your intelligent citizens build a thriving metropolis around your will.

name: Tiny Dangerous Dungeons Remake
description: Guide Timmy the little treasure hunter through traps and puzzles to reach the legendary treasure. This classic mini metroidvania is remade with new visuals, music, and content.

name: Death Remains
description: Enter Death Remains: an open-world, permadeath survival. Scavenge, build, and barter or battle factions across a harsh sandbox. Master ruthless RPG skills, but remember—when you die, Death Remains.

name: Overencumbered In Another World
description: In this organisation puzzle game you must rotate, reload, combine and consume items to fit everything into your inventory.

name: Mole: Great Adventure
description: Mole: The Great Expedition is a 2D platformer addressed to the youngest players. The main character sets out to search for the herbs needed to prepare a cure for a sick mother. The game was created by Red Dot Games studio.

name: The Rise of the Golden Idol: The Sins of New Wells
Caveman hits Giraffe in a Car
Magic Survivor Undead
description: Slay the infected, Fight the gods and protect humanity. Only you can rebuild what was lost in this roguelike game. Gather resources to build up your base, craft weapons and create magics in this game influenced by Vampire Survivors and Call of Duty Zombies.

name: Settler's Domain
description: Settler's Domain is a settlement-building game with citizen and resource management elements. Build structures, recruit settlers, gather resources, and explore your surroundings.

name: Hidden Dogs: In the Dog House
Cozy Organizer
description: Organize, decorate, align, and stack items in cozy environments.

name: DexSweeper
description: A minesweeper-type game where the cursor never stops moving. Use the Playdate's crank to guide your movement, then time your tile reveals carefully. One wrong move could be your last.

name: They Live in the Fractures
description: David finally finished his time machine and will be able to stop time and venture to the unknown realm of frozen time. But one should not go and play God.

name: Regista
description: Be the owner of your football club, make strategic choices, and climb through the amateur league to the first while making hard decisions.

name: Umbral Astral Dreamers
description:
In the space between the tangible and the intangible exist "a bridge" that connects both realities. This bridge is called Umbral.

The Umbral is a mysterious place protected by autonomous machines made of sand and silicon called Astrals.

You take control of Aysel, a new astral on her first mission.
What will be your mission? Can you achieve it without dying in the attempt?

name: The Lord of the Rings: Aragorn's Quest
description: The PlayStation 2 and handheld versions of the game are different from the Wii and PS3 version in several ways. For example, they lack a co-op mode or the free-roam Shire overworld. However, it includes an arena mode not featured in the Wii and PS3 versions, and levels set in Caradhras, at the Gates of Erebor (including a battle with the Watcher in the Water), and in Dunharrow, areas not found in the Wii/PS3 versions. This version is played from an isometric three-quarter top-down view, and is more of an action role-playing game, featuring stat-management and experience points to spend on special abilities. The Wii/PS3 version does not feature any kind of stat-management or experience points, save for the abovementioned ability to collect items to improve the attack and defense of characters.

name: Sky Lanes
description:
Sky Lanes is an homage to the 90s MS-DOS arcade racing game Skyroads.
You race on straight courses, evade obstacles and jump onto different lanes.

The game supports ray-traced reflections and ambient occlusion, but it's not a requirement and can be disabled.

name: Battle
description: A turn-based elemental powers battle system created for GBJAM #2 (GameBoy Jam). Art cooked up by Ethan Holbert.

name: The Bear: A Story from the World of Gra
description: Home is where the stars are. An interactive bedtime story, for anyone who needs one. Take the bear and the little one on a deeply meaningful journey, as you experience stories of togetherness, of letting go and of finding a place you belong.

name: The Wall
description: Defend the city, Fight the dead. In this fast paced zombie wall defence game set in a neon cyberpunk world, you must man the wall, upgrade defences and build robots and turrets. Face relentless waves of undead as you hold out as long as you can. Its not about if the wall falls its about when.

name: Mini Merchant
description: Saddle up your Caravan Demon and journey out to explore the Land Of The Ancient King! Explore beaches, meadows, tundra and desert to buy, sell, uncover and unlock items, and become the richest merchant in the land! A classic collect-a-thon adventure RPG, from Astrarium Games.

name: Defying the Shadows
description: Embark on a tactical roguelite adventure where you assemble your team of heroes to battle the Shadow army in turn-based combat. Test your strategy, adaptability and progress through the game to upgrade your characters and unlock new ones, shaping your ultimate squad for the battles ahead!

name: Tale of Dark Lands
description: Tale of Dark Lands is a fantasy action RPG in a charming low-poly style with the spirit of an old fairy tale. A brave mercenary gets drawn into an ancient dark story that threatens the entire land. Develop your hero and fight dangerous enemies! Become a legend and stop the approaching darkness!

name: Sky End Market
description: Set up shelves, arrange products, and make your store bigger and bigger. Sell your goods to the remaining people, animals, and robots in the last place on earth just before the human race is exterminated.

name: Play Twice
description: "Enjoy Twice" – A new Sokoban-style puzzle game, Play Twice! Once you clear a stage, a second playthrough begins on the same board. Enjoy a dual-layered puzzle experience where strategic planning for the second round is the key to success!

name: Eternal Prowl
description:
After many years, you return to your hometown, but nothing is as you remember it. The streets are empty, familiar places feel distant, and the past seems to have faded away. The old school bus is your only clue, leading you deeper into a mystery that begs to be solved.

Immerse yourself in an emotional journey filled with forgotten memories and unsettling discoveries. As you explore an abandoned house, you’ll uncover hidden secrets and solve a crucial puzzle that reveals the truth behind the town’s eerie transformation.

name: Shrine of the Forest God
description: Explore and fight your way through a dense and sprawling world filled with mystery. Take your checkpoint with you while discovering secrets and abilities as you fight your way up the mountain you found yourself in. Do you have what it takes to slay the Forest God?

name: Twistcan
description:
This game was created as a part of the "0 hour game jam", a game jam taking place over the end of Daylight Savings Time, between 2 AM and 2 AM.

Shoot enemies before they touch you! When you shoot an enemy, you teleport to their place.

name: Vasterra
description: Enter the world of Helheim and build your village on a desolate island in the underworld of Norse mythology. Improve and maintain your village by gathering resources and defending it from enemy attacks. Can you thrive in the realm of the dead?

name: Roll a Dice
description: "Roll a Dice" is a dice game full of strategy and luck, combining classic props and set effects. In this 8x6 building table, players need to roll dice, activate cells, and trigger different effects to accumulate points and challenge higher goals.

name: Undercover Fools
description: Infiltrate a secure building, cleverly bypass guards and traps, complete tasks with the help of cool spy gadgets. Play alone or with friends, upgrade your spy skills and plan excellent missions, and most importantly... Don't screw up!

name: Soul Trader
description: Welcome to the NecronomiCon: The most anticipated convention for necromancers from across the land! Gather your minions and craft powerful synergies as you face your rivals in this inventive Roguelike Deckbuilder!

name: Lost Valley of the Frog King
description: You are the captain of an arctic expedition. Months into the voyage, you discover an uncharted island, encased in a wall of ice. You decide to take a closer look and meet with your boat on the far side of the island. What will you discover?

name: Town Survival
description:
Mayors, welcome to Town Survival: Zombie Games, a survival and town-building simulation game themed in zombie catastrophe.
Virus leaked...zombies mutated...Mayors, now is your time to rebuild the town destoryed by zombies and protect residents. Make sure your residents stay survival!

name: Treasure Hunt
description: Treasure Hunt is a fast-paced party game where up to 6 players compete as pirates to dig up hidden treasure chests, steal loot from each other, and outsmart their rivals. Use quick reflexes to dig, roll, and shoot your way to victory in chaotic, treasure-filled battles.
Let's do some easy math with the girls!

name: Miryam: The Polluted Land
description: Traverse the wasteland with Miryam. Use magic items to build defenses against evil spirits. It's a casual tower defense game of construction and resource balance. Characters grow via challenges, from timid to fearless and wild. The blend of building and defense makes it addictive and engaging

name: Beast Slayer Origin
description: Embark on an epic journey of revenge and redemption in Beast Slayer, a game inspired by the thrill of Monster Hunter and the strategic depth of classic Final Fantasy titles. Your once peaceful town has been decimated by a fearsome beast, setting you on a path of vengeance. Saved by a slayer, you now aim to become a Master Slayer yourself.

name: Dogs Contrast
description: Get ready for an exciting adventure where you will have to find 10 differences between two similar images with cute dogs.??

name: Nebulock
description: Nebulock is a short bullet-hell game with intense gameplay, where the player must destroy bosses made of blocks, collect resources and upgrade his spaceship.

name: Fisher Idle
description: Start from scratch in the middle of the ocean as a fisherman! Buy bigger boats, upgrade your ships, and build your fishing empire. Remember: more fish means more gold!

name: iDigging
description: In iDigging, you’ll balance treasure hunting, home improvement, and the strategy of hiding from curious neighbors and authorities. Upgrade, dig, and create your best life despite all the challenges!

name: Rogue Conflict
description: Rogue Conflict is a turn-based strategy roguelike. Combining tactical wargame combat with procedural roguelike features, Rogue Conflict is a game made for both wargamers and general turn based game enthusiasts alike.

name: Rabbit Trail
description: Wake up in a magical forest... as a rabbit. Something strange has happened to you, and solving it won’t be easy. Explore fascinating worlds, face challenging puzzles, and unravel the mystery of how you lost your human form. Each jump brings you closer to the truth... Are you ready to discover it?

name: The Night of Escape
description: The Night of Escape" is an indie game personally crafted with themes of fear, escape, and decryption. Players take on the role of an escapee, constantly dodging danger and utilizing clues found to survive and flee. The game adopts a first-person perspective, immersing you in the experience.

name: Circuit Maze
description: Tower defense without combat. Circuit Maze is a puzzle game where you need to build the longest possible maze with the resources you are given.

name: Dead of Night: Supermarket
description: Experience the dread of a midnight shift in a quiet supermarket. As mundane tasks blur with eerie events, discover that the darkness hides more than just silence.

name: Mystal Haven
description: Mystal Haven is a laid-back, open-world creature-collecting game with 4-player split-screen and online multiplayer.

name: Cosmic Arcade Tycoon
description: Welcome to Cosmic Arcade Tycoon! Build your own Arcade in this tiny, cozy and casual sci-fi simulation! Unlock new objects, customize your layout and welcome cute alien visitors to create a flourishing entertainment hub!

name: Buffet Knight: Decadent Full Course
description: Gobble up everything around you in this hungry action adventure as Buffet Knight. Battle monsters, conquer puzzling dungeons, save the culinary world! The more you eat, the stronger you grow... But will you end up biting off more than you can chew?
